means: 好像，仿佛( seem的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Whatever troubles arise, we'll have peace of mind amidst seeming chaos.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论出现什么样的麻烦，我们都会在貌似混乱的情形中保持平和的心态。

sentence.Network_en: She handled the matter with seeming indifference.
sentence.Network_cn: 她看似漫不经心地处理了这件事。

sentence.Network_en: For all his seeming calmness, he was really very nervous.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管他表面上镇定, 其实非常紧张.

Despite the seeming setback of the death of apprentice , Sidious continues his shadowy plots ., 尽管表面上历经学徒死亡的挫败 , 西帝仍持续他难以捉摸的阴谋.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... seem 似乎 seeming 似乎的 seesaw 跷跷板.

list.abs: but all I seem to do is fetch and carry for her ., 她雇佣我为她的私人助理 , 但我似乎要做的一切是替她打杂.
well , they seem to be missing ., 噢 , 他们似乎失踪了.
人教版八年级下册英语重点短语 -... ... 12. get mad 生气，感到恼火 14. seem like 看上去像…… 17. in public places 在公众场合.
you seem too wanna hurt me ., 你似乎想伤害我.

entry.tran: 表面上的;貌似的;似是而非的
entry.def: Seeming means appearing to be the case, but not necessarily the case. For example, if you talk about someone's seeming ability to do something, you mean that they appear to be able to do it, but you are not certain.

example.ex: Wall Street analysts have been highly critical of the company's seeming inability to control costs...
example.tran: 华尔街的分析家们对该公司似乎无力控制成本一事一直都严厉指责。

example.ex: Whatever troubles arise, we'll have peace of mind amidst seeming chaos.
example.tran: 无论出现什么样的麻烦，我们都会在貌似混乱的情形中保持平和的心态。

means.word_mean: 1. appearing as such but not necessarily so;

sentences.sentence: "for all his apparent wealth he had no money to pay the rent"

auth_sentence.content: Hers was a mournful, husky, elderly-seeming voice.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hers was a mournful, husky, elderly-seeming voice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hers was a mournful, husky, elderly-seeming voice.

auth_sentence.content: His face seeming ascetic until cheered by a smile.
auth_sentence.res_content: His face seeming ascetic until cheered by a smile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His face seeming ascetic until cheered by a smile.

auth_sentence.content: Your fair-seeming face covered the...vice of your true nature.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your fair-seeming face covered the...vice of your true nature.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your fair-seeming face covered the...vice of your true nature.

stems_affixes.word_buile: seeming表面上的+ly表副词→adv.表面上地
seem相类似,一样→v.象是, 似乎

Sentence.sentence: Extravagance (奢侈) is out Business folk are bending over backwards to avoid seeming extravagant.
Goldman Sachs, an investment bank, cancelled a conference in Las Vegas in order to avoid seeming wasteful
Today we face seeming challenges in energy, the environment, health care.

sentences.en: For all his seeming calmness, he was really very nervous.
sentences.cn: 尽管他表面上镇定,其实非常紧张。
